arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

arg.name: arg 1
arg.jname: ボタン名 (日本語、省略可)

params.sqlcmd: "select " +" T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\") as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" T_OD.OUTSIDE_TYP as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP_DN\\", " +" T_OD.MRP_ODR_TYP as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP_DN\\", " +" to_char(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"DUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"DUE_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"DM_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"DM_QTY\\", " +" to_char(NVL(T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"sum_ALCD_QTY\\", 0), 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"sum_ALCD_QTY\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"PRD_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"PRD_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"ODR_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" to_char(NVL(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"sum_OPR_INST_QTY\\", 0), 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"sum_OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" to_char(NVL(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"sum_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", 0), 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"sum_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\") as \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" as \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP_DN\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_OD, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_JOB_ODR, " +" ( " +" select " +" sum(T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"ALCD_QTY\\") as \\"sum_ALCD_QTY\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\" " +" from " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC " +" where " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +" group by " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" ) T_JOB_ODR_ALC, " +" ( " +" select " +" sum(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\") as \\"sum_OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\" " +" from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +" where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +" group by " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" ) T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" ( " +" select " +" sum(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\") as \\"sum_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\" " +" from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR " +" where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +" and T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" IS NULL " +" group by " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" ) T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"OD_NO\\"(+) " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\"(+) " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"OD_NO\\"(+) " +" and T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" = T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" " +" and to_char(T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\") = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\") as \\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\" as \\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG_DN\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') || ' ' || decode(to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'HH24:MI'),'00:00','',to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'HH24:MI')) as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') || ' ' || decode(to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'HH24:MI'),'00:00','',to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'HH24:MI')) as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" T_OD.OUTSIDE_TYP as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP_DN\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" = ?"

"UPDATE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"SET " +" \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MI'), " +" \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\" = TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MI'), " +" \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\" = TO_NUMBER(?), " +" \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" = ? " +"WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"select " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +"for update nowait"
"delete from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"INSERT INTO " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM(\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"OD_NO\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\", \\"WORK_STS_TYP\\", \\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\", \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\") " +"VALUES " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MI'), TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24MI'), TO_NUMBER(?), TO_NUMBER(?), 1, 0, ?)"

"select " +" to_char(M_CAL.\\"HOLIDAY_FLG\\") as \\"HOLIDAY_FLG\\" " +"from " +" M_CAL, " +" M_PLANT " +"where " +" to_date(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') = ? " +" and M_PLANT.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = M_PLANT.\\"CAL_NO\\""
"select " +" to_char(BUSINESS_OPR_DATE, 'yyyy/mm/dd') as BUSINESS_OPR_DATE " +"from " +" SYS_DATE_CTRL " +"where " +" PLANT_CD = ?"

"select " +" b.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" b.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" b.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" b.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" b.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\", " +" count(a.\\"OD_NO\\") as \\"CHILD\\" " +"from " +" T_OD a, " +" ( " +" select " +" b.\\"OD_NO\\" as \\"OD_NO\\", " +" b.\\"PLANT_CD\\" as \\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" b.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" b.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(b.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\") as \\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\", " +" to_char(b.\\"OD_TYP\\") as \\"OD_TYP\\", " +" to_char(b.\\"MRP_TYP\\") as \\"MRP_TYP\\" " +" from " +" T_OD b " +" where " +" b.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" = ? " +" and b.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and to_char(b.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\") = ? " +" and b.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" ) b " +"where " +" a.PARENT_OD_NO(+) = b.OD_NO " +"group by " +" b.\\"OD_NO\\", " +" b.\\"PLANT_CD\\", " +" b.\\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" b.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" b.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\", " +" b.\\"OD_TYP\\", " +" b.\\"MRP_TYP\\" " +"order by " +" b.\\"ITEM_CD\\""

"select " +" to_char(count(T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"JOB_ODR_ALC_CD\\")) as \\"JOB_ODR_ALC_CD\\", " +" to_char(min(T_OD.\\"DUE_DATE\\"), 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"DUE_DATE\\", " +" to_char(min(T_OD.\\"DUE_DATE\\"), 'HH24MI') as \\"DUE_DATE_TIME\\" " +"from " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC, " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" = 0 " +" and T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" " +"group by " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"PLANT_CD\\""

"select " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"FIXED_LT\\") as \\"FIXED_LT\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LT\\") as \\"PROP_LT\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"SAFETY_LT\\") as \\"SAFETY_LT\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\") as \\"PROP_LOT_SIZE\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" as \\"COMPANY_CD\\" " +"from " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY " +"where " +" SYS_MY_COMPANY.\\"CTRL_CD\\" = 'SYSTEM'"

"select " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H.\\"VEND_CD\\" as \\"VEND_CD\\", " +" M_VEND_CTRL.EXCH_TYP as EXCH_TYP, " +" M_CUR.CUR_CD as CUR_CD, " +" M_CUR.CUR_NAME as CUR_NAME, " +" M_CUR.CUR_UNIT as VEND_CUR_UNIT, " +" M_CUR.DECIMAL_FIG as VEND_DECIMAL_FIG, " +" M_VEND_CTRL.OWN_PERSON_NAME as OWN_PERSON_NAME " +"from " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H, " +" M_VEND_CTRL, " +" M_CUR, " +" SYS_HOME_CUR " +"where " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H.\\"COMPANY_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H.\\"PLANT_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H.\\"VEND_CD\\" = M_VEND_CTRL.VEND_CD(+) " +" and M_CUR.CUR_CD = nvl(M_VEND_CTRL.CUR_CD, SYS_HOME_CUR.HOME_CUR_CD) " +" and SYS_HOME_CUR.CTRL_CD = 'SYSTEM' " +"order by " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H.\\"PUCH_PRIORITY_REF_NO\\", " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST_H.\\"VEND_CD\\""

"select " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\") as \\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\") as \\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\") as \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" " +"from " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ?"
"select " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" as \\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" " +"from " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR " +"where " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"insert into " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR(\\"PUCH_ODR_CD\\", \\"ITEM_CD\\", \\"NON_NO_ITEM_NAME\\", \\"NON_NO_ITEM_TYP\\", \\"COMPANY_CD\\", \\"VEND_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_PERSON\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_START_DATE\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", \\"NON_NO_ITEM_PUCH_ODR_UNIT\\", \\"UNIT_COST_TYP\\", \\"UNIT_COST\\", \\"PROCESSING_COST\\", \\"MATERIAL_COST\\", \\"OTHER_OVERHEADS\\", \\"DISC_AMOUNT\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_AMOUNT\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_GNR_TYP\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_INST_DATE\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_INST_SLIP_ISS_FLG\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_SLIP_ISS_DATE\\", \\"ACPT_CMPLT_DATE\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_STS_TYP\\", \\"INSPC_CMPLT_FLG\\", \\"INSPC_CMPLT_DATE\\", \\"CONFIRM_DLV_DATE\\", \\"SPL_ITEM_TYP\\", \\"ACPT_INSPC_TYP\\", \\"INV_CTRL_FLG\\", \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", \\"WORK_IN_PROC_CD\\", \\"OD_NO\\", \\"PUCH_ODR_COMMENT\\", \\"ODR_CD\\", \\"DETAIL_NO\\", \\"RATE_JUDGE_DATE\\", \\"TAX_RATE_1\\", \\"TAX_RATE_2\\", \\"TAX_RATE_3\\", \\"NET_AMOUNT\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_1\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_2\\", \\"TAX_AMOUNT_3\\", \\"AMOUNT_INCLUDE_TAX\\", \\"HOME_CUR_AMOUNT\\", \\"TAX_CD\\", \\"TAX_ROUND_TYP\\", \\"WH_CD\\", \\"EXCH_RATE\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, null, 0, ?, ?, ?, ?, to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), ?, null, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, 0, ?, 3, null, 0, null, null, 1, 0, null, null, ?, ?, 1, null, null, ?, ?, null, 0, to_date(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI:SS'), ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)"
"insert into " +" SYS_MSG_LOG(\\"LOG_CD\\", \\"PLANT_CD\\", \\"BUSINESS_NAME\\", \\"MSG_CD\\", \\"MSG\\", \\"DATA_STRING\\") " +"values " +" (?, ?, ?, ?, ?, ?)"

"select " +" to_char(M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.UNIT_COST_TYP) as UNIT_COST_TYP, " +" to_char(M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.UNIT_COST, 'fm99999999999990.0099') as UNIT_COST, " +" to_char(M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.PROCESSING_COST, 'fm99999999999990.0099') as PROCESSING_COST, " +" to_char(M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.MATERIAL_COST, 'fm99999999999990.0099') as MATERIAL_COST, " +" to_char(M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.OTHER_OVERHEADS, 'fm99999999999990.0099') as OTHER_OVERHEADS " +"from " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST " +"where " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.COMPANY_CD = ? " +" and M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.VEND_CD = ? " +" and M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.PLANT_CD = ? " +" and M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.ITEM_CD = ? " +" and M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE <= TO_DATE(?, 'YYYY/MM/DD') " +" and M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.PUCH_SIZE <= TO_NUMBER(?) " +"order by " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.EFF_PHASE_IN_DATE desc, " +" M_PUCH_UNIT_COST.PUCH_SIZE desc"

"select " +" T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\") as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"PRD_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"PRD_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"DUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"h_DUE_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"h_ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" as \\"h_PARENT_OD_NO\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\") as \\"h_UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\") as \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP_DN\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" as \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP_DN\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" as \\"h_MANHOUR_TYP\\" " +"from " +" T_OD, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\"(+) " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" as \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\") as \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" as \\"h_PARENT_OD_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"DUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"h_DUE_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') as \\"h_ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" as \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" as \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" as \\"SPEC\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\") as \\"h_UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" as \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\") as \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\") as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.\\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\" as \\"MRP_ODR_TYP_DN\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_RSLT_TYP\\" as \\"OPR_RSLT_TYP_DN\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" as \\"h_MANHOUR_TYP\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" T_OD, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\"(+) " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\"(+) " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" = ?"

"SELECT " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" AS \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\") AS \\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\", " +" T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" AS \\"ITEM_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_NAME\\" AS \\"ITEM_NAME\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"DRAW_CD\\" AS \\"DRAW_CD\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"SPEC\\" AS \\"SPEC\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\") AS \\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"STOCK_UNIT\\" AS \\"STOCK_UNIT\\", " +" T_OD.OUTSIDE_TYP AS \\"OUTSIDE_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.MRP_ODR_TYP AS \\"MRP_ODR_TYP\\", " +" T_OD.OUTSIDE_TYP AS \\"OUTSIDE_TYP_DN\\", " +" T_OD.MRP_ODR_TYP AS \\"MRP_ODR_TYP_DN\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"DUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS \\"DUE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"DM_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') AS \\"DM_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(NVL(T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"sum_ALCD_QTY\\", 0), 'fm99999999999990.0999') AS \\"sum_ALCD_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS \\"PRD_DUE_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"PRD_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS \\"PRD_START_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"ODR_START_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MI') AS \\"ODR_START_DATE\\", " +" TO_CHAR(T_OD.\\"ODR_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') AS \\"ODR_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(NVL(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"sum_OPR_INST_QTY\\", 0), 'fm99999999999990.0999') AS \\"sum_OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" TO_CHAR(NVL(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"sum_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", 0), 'fm99999999999990.0999') AS \\"sum_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" AS \\"h_PARENT_OD_NO\\", " +" M_ITEM.\\"MANHOUR_TYP\\" AS \\"h_MANHOUR_TYP\\" " +"FROM " +" T_OD, " +" M_ITEM, " +" T_JOB_ODR, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" SUM(T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"ALCD_QTY\\") AS \\"sum_ALCD_QTY\\", " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"OD_NO\\" AS \\"OD_NO\\" " +" FROM " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC " +" WHERE " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +" GROUP BY " +" T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" ) T_JOB_ODR_ALC, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" SUM(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\") AS \\"sum_OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" AS \\"OD_NO\\" " +" FROM " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM " +" WHERE " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +" GROUP BY " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" ) T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" ( " +" SELECT " +" SUM(T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"PUCH_ODR_QTY\\") AS \\"sum_PUCH_ODR_QTY\\", " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"OD_NO\\" AS \\"OD_NO\\" " +" FROM " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR " +" WHERE " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +" AND T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" IS NULL " +" GROUP BY " +" T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"OD_NO\\" " +" ) T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR " +"WHERE " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_JOB_ODR_ALC.\\"OD_NO\\"(+) " +" AND T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\"(+) " +" AND T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = T_RLSD_PUCH_ODR.\\"OD_NO\\"(+) " +" AND T_OD.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" AND T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" " +" AND T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" = T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" " +" AND T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" " +" AND T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\") as \\"h_PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG\\" as \\"PROC_EXPLOSION_FLG_DN\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_CD\\" as \\"WORK_ODR_CD\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\") as \\"WORK_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" FNCGETFORMATTEDDATETIME(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\") as \\"OPR_INST_START_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", 'fm99999999999990.0999') as \\"OPR_INST_QTY\\", " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\" as \\"WORK_IN_PROC_COMMENT\\", " +" to_char(T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"MODIFY_COUNT\\") as \\"MODIFY_COUNT\\", " +" to_char(M_ITEM.\\"UNIT_QTY_TYP\\") as \\"l_UNIT_QTY_TYP\\" " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" as \\"JOB_ODR_CD\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\") as \\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\") as \\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\", " +" to_char(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\") as \\"JOB_ODR_TYP\\", " +" to_char(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') as \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", " +" to_char(T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE\\", 'HH24MI') as \\"JOB_ODR_DLV_DATE_TIME\\" " +"from " +" T_OD, " +" T_JOB_ODR " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" = T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CD\\" " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" = T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_DETAIL_NO\\" " +" and T_OD.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" = T_JOB_ODR.\\"JOB_ODR_CANCEL_NO\\" " +" and T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" = ?"
"select " +" T_OD.\\"OD_NO\\" " +"from " +" T_OD " +"where " +" T_OD.\\"PARENT_OD_NO\\" = ?"

"select " +" to_char(M_CAL.\\"HOLIDAY_FLG\\") as \\"HOLIDAY_FLG\\" " +"from " +" M_CAL, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" to_date(M_CAL.\\"CAL_DATE\\", 'YYYY/MM/DD') = ? " +" and M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and M_CAL.\\"CAL_NO\\" = M_ITEM.\\"CAL_NO\\""
"SELECT " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"VALUE\\" AS \\"VALUE\\" " +"FROM " +" SYS_PARAMETER " +"WHERE " +" SYS_PARAMETER.\\"NAME\\" = 'TIME_CTRL'"

"select " +" count(1) " +"from " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM, " +" M_ITEM " +"where " +" T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"WORK_STS_TYP\\" = 1 " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = M_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"ITEM_CD\\" = ? " +" and T_WORK_IN_PROC_BY_ITEM.\\"OD_NO\\" = ? " +" and ROWNUM <= NVL(TO_NUMBER(?), ROWNUM) + 1"
